title: 大家请看看这是怎么啦？？？？？？？？？？？？
author: frk
txt_content:
Minecraft has crashed!

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to D:\游戏B\科技世纪：无尽纪元V1.5.1 - Client\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-09-30_10.12.29-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

replies.author: Sky、果冻
replies.txt_content: 游戏崩溃了，有可能是MOD冲突或者是电脑配置问题
内存溢出  或者MOD 冲突

replies.author: pkstar
replies.txt_content: 啊，不对，是史莱姆，幸好是2联
